ibid.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used in formal writing to mean from the same book, writer, or article as the one that has just been mentioned
ibid.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to explain that something is from the same book or article as the one that has just been mentioned
ibid.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: These data are reflected in the estimates (ibid. p. 7).
